datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DS.DSTERM

self.title: Reported Term for the Disposition Event

datasetVariables.description: DSTERM is the original term recorded for animal disposition. DSTERM is not under controlled terminology, but should be mapped to DSDECOD.
datasetVariables.label: Reported Term for the Disposition Event
datasetVariables.name: DSTERM

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89968

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DS.DSDECOD

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result in a standard format.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Disposition Term
datasetVariables.name: DSDECOD

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DS.VISITDY

datasetVariables.description: Planned study day of the disposition event. Should be an integer. VISITDY should be populated only when DSTERM represents a scheduled activity.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Study Day of Disposition
datasetVariables.name: VISITDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DS.DSSTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of the disposition event in ISO 8601 format.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Disposition
datasetVariables.name: DSSTDTC

modelClassVariable.title: Study Day of Start of Observation

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DS.DSSTDY

datasetVariables.description: Study day of the disposition event, in integer days. The algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in the Demographics (DM) domain.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Disposition
datasetVariables.name: DSSTDY

description: An events domain that contains information encompassing and representing data related to subject disposition. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C49576, 2018-06-29)
label: Disposition
name: DS
